title: Need subs for ranked team
body:
I'm looking for substitute for my Ranked Team need players to be active,non toxic and silver +

Everyone will be switching in and out from rank team to make space
Ranked team will normally be on for games at 6:00PM-10:00PM and all 5 role are free
{{summoner:12}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:3}}
